pages.text: The $(l:https://github.com/Creators-of-Create/Create/wiki)Create wiki$(/l) will show you about all the details and features of this mod.$(br2)If you still need help, then you can join their $(l:https://discord.gg/hmaD7Se)discord$(/l).$(br2)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/create)Curseforge page$(/l)
